text: Recently discovered this park connector. Great for a jog or walk making everything so accessible. Many walking their dogs or some even fishing! Take some to enjoy the path this connector leads to!
A long walk park under the HDB, very convenient for the residents nearby. Very good place for fitness and running. But I guess once the new HBD finished, the park should be more crowded.
Nice path for a long slow stroll in the evening or morning.
Great track with nice scenic view. Link all the way from dawson to marina bay.

Great inner city walking and running path.  If pedestrians didn't need to cross over too many roads, then it would've been perfect.

The great thing is though, is that you can walk all the way down to marina bay.  I think the paths are wide enough and generally well lit at night.
